data.name: Vader Immortal: Episode II
data.description: Continue your journey into the heart of Darth Vader's dark fortress in Vader Immortal: A Star Wars VR Series - Episode II. With the fearsome Sith Lord as your guide, you'll perfect your lightsaber skills against terrifying new enemies, and master the Force as you discover the truth of an ancient mystery beneath the fiery surface of Mustafar. Starring Maya Rudolph, Vader Immortal is a canonical Star Wars experience created by ILMxLAB and Lucasfilm in collaboration with Oculus Studios.

changelog.change_log:
- Implemented French, German, Japanese, Korean, Italian, and Spanish subtitles and menus
- Fixes to increase stability in the Lady Corvax pinboard hallway
- Fixed an issue that could lead to a long black screen at startup after an OS update

- PhysX upgrade to 4.21.1.
- Thread prioritization change to alleviate audio corruption in certain cases.
- Docking system math error fix.
- Prevent certain conditions that would stop Dojo rounds from ending.
- Prevent certain conditions that cause melee droids to lose collision.

Story: 
- Fixed rare situation where the player could fail to trigger the start of Force Training.    
- Fixed hitch at beginning of Vader rock fight.
- Memory reduction to alleviate Quest-only issue in second hallway.
- Fixed issue where tutorial could remain on-screen in certain cases.
- Ensured exiting Vader rock fight results in proper streaming behavior in all cases.
- Fixed hand grab re-enabling while loading during pause in certain cases.
- Fixed issues on Rift when loading during Dash pause.
- Prevent backtracking at Crypt in certain cases.
- Fixed rare situation where player could bypass Reunion trigger volume.
- Fixed infrequent missing fade-in in Darkghast nest.

Dojo:
- Fixed trap SFX remaining if triggered during fade out
